name: Talk To Me personality test (RedGames102)
description:
I apologize for my bad English

  • Talk To Me Personality test is a free Horror game, this was developed and provided by one person. 
  • Short Info About The Game: You play yourself and take part in a personality test. You answer questions that the program asks you, each answer gives you a different ending. 
  • More Information About The Content Of The Game: Warning, I Programmed The Game As Realistically As I Could, Some Content Could Be Disturbing Or Scary On Others. Note The story and the contents of the game were fictitious. Have fun playing. 
  • PS: I wouldn't complain about a gameplay video of this game, if you stream or record the game, I'll be happy.

This game is completely free and completely ad-free, you don't have to pay a penny. But if you want to support me and you like the game, I would appreciate a small donation so that I can make more games of this kind in the near future. Thanks to everyone who downloaded and played the game.

I apologize for my bad English
